turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can I help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order a coffee from Starbucks on North Bend Road in Cincinnati, Ohio.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok starbucks from cincinnati ohio is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where in cincinnati ohio would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: north bend rd cincinnati ohio is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I like a caffè latte grande with 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok latte grande 2% milk is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok let me find the store closes to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: we have a starbucks store at 8421 Winton Rd is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok let me confirm your order for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so thats 1 latte grande 2% milk without any additional flavoring at the starbucks store at 8421 Winton Rd is that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your drink has been ordered at the store and will be ready for pickup shortly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be sent to their mobile device via text message.
